description: retreives data from a PostgreSQL database.

input.name: hostname
input.description: The name of the database host. Defaults to `localhost`.

input.name: port
input.description: The port the database is exposed on. Defaults to `5432`.

input.name: query
input.description: The query to be passed to the database.

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
